laboratory_examinations.findings: Good left ventricular (LV) function, thickened 28-mm predominantly anterior LV wall, pronounced delayed hyperenhancement within hypertrophied muscle areas.
Myocardial disarray of muscular fibers and pronounced fibrosis.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) for family member
laboratory_examinations.findings: Good ventricular function, more pronounced delayed hyperenhancement in hypertrophied LV, more septal affected areas.
